message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think this is a fair deal. I get a bit more, but you still get a good chunk.
Okay, let's try this again. I'll take a little less this time with $55, leaving you with $45.  It's a fair deal considering the money will be worth even less soon.
I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the inflation is hitting me harder. Let's make a deal before the money is worth even less!
This is getting ridiculous! Let's just split it down the middle 50/50 before the inflation eats away at the money any further.
